The sentences are clearly separated by periods, fulfilling the requirement to include at least three separate sentences. Additionally, the input comprises letters and punctuation, which is acceptable according to the specification.

Since the input contains the required number of sentences and doesn't violate any other criteria from the input specification, it complies with all specified rules.

OK
